languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, на офицерской палубе некоторый переполох. Леди-Навигатор покинула свои покои и сейчас находится в кают-компании. Непросвещенные члены экипажа в ужасе сторонятся ее — возможно, вам стоит выяснить, что привело Кассию на палубу".

"Lord Captain, there is some commotion on the officers' deck — the Lady Navigator has left her quarters and is currently in the wardroom, where uninitiated crew members are shunning her in terror. Perhaps you should find out what has brought Cassia to the deck."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, на офицерской палубе некоторый переполох. Леди-Навигатор покинула свои покои и сейчас находится в кают-компании. Непросвещенные члены экипажа в ужасе сторонятся ее — возможно, вам стоит выяснить, что привело Кассию на палубу".

"Lord Captain, there is some commotion on the officers' deck — the Lady Navigator has left her quarters and is currently in the wardroom, where uninitiated crew members are shunning her in terror. Perhaps you should find out what has brought Cassia to the deck."

"Lord Captain, there is some commotion on the officers' deck — the Lady Navigator has left her quarters and is currently in the wardroom, where uninitiated crew members are shunning her in terror. Perhaps you should find out what has brought Cassia to the deck."

languages.text: “舰长大人，军官甲板上发生了骚动。导航者女士已经离开了房间，目前正在军官会议室，所有没见过她的船员都被她吓得心惊胆战。或许您应该弄清楚，卡西娅女士来甲板上究竟有什么事情。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there is some commotion on the officers' deck — the Lady Navigator has left her quarters and is currently in the wardroom, where uninitiated crew members are shunning her in terror. Perhaps you should find out what has brought Cassia to the deck."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，军官甲板上发生了骚动。导航者女士已经离开了房间，目前正在军官会议室，所有没见过她的船员都被她吓得心惊胆战。或许您应该弄清楚，卡西娅女士来甲板上究竟有什么事情。”

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, ha habido un altercado en la cubierta de oficiales. La lady Navegante ha salido de sus aposentos y está en la sala de oficiales, donde los miembros no iniciados de la tripulación le están dando la espalda, aterrados. Tal vez le convenga descubrir qué trae a Cassia a la cubierta».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there is some commotion on the officers' deck — the Lady Navigator has left her quarters and is currently in the wardroom, where uninitiated crew members are shunning her in terror. Perhaps you should find out what has brought Cassia to the deck."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, ha habido un altercado en la cubierta de oficiales. La lady Navegante ha salido de sus aposentos y está en la sala de oficiales, donde los miembros no iniciados de la tripulación le están dando la espalda, aterrados. Tal vez le convenga descubrir qué trae a Cassia a la cubierta».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、士官デッキで騒ぎが起きています。航宙士殿が宿舎を離れ、現在士官室にいるのですが、不慣れなクルーが恐怖のあまりに彼女を避けています。カシア様がデッキに来られた理由を調べるのが良いでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there is some commotion on the officers' deck — the Lady Navigator has left her quarters and is currently in the wardroom, where uninitiated crew members are shunning her in terror. Perhaps you should find out what has brought Cassia to the deck."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、士官デッキで騒ぎが起きています。航宙士殿が宿舎を離れ、現在士官室にいるのですが、不慣れなクルーが恐怖のあまりに彼女を避けています。カシア様がデッキに来られた理由を調べるのが良いでしょう」

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, il y a de l'agitation sur le pont des officiers. Il semblerait que la navigatrice ait quitté ses quartiers pour se rendre dans le carré des officiers, mais les non-initiés sont terrorisés par sa présence. Vous devriez peut-être aller voir ce qu'elle fait là-bas. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there is some commotion on the officers' deck — the Lady Navigator has left her quarters and is currently in the wardroom, where uninitiated crew members are shunning her in terror. Perhaps you should find out what has brought Cassia to the deck."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, il y a de l'agitation sur le pont des officiers. Il semblerait que la navigatrice ait quitté ses quartiers pour se rendre dans le carré des officiers, mais les non-initiés sont terrorisés par sa présence. Vous devriez peut-être aller voir ce qu'elle fait là-bas. »

languages.text: "Lord Captain, auf dem Offiziersdeck herrscht Aufruhr. Die Lady Navigator hat ihr Quartier verlassen und ist augenblicklich in der Offiziersmesse, wo uneingeweihte Crewmitglieder entsetzt vor ihr zurückweichen. Vielleicht solltet Ihr herausfinden, was Cassia auf das Deck geführt hat."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there is some commotion on the officers' deck — the Lady Navigator has left her quarters and is currently in the wardroom, where uninitiated crew members are shunning her in terror. Perhaps you should find out what has brought Cassia to the deck."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, auf dem Offiziersdeck herrscht Aufruhr. Die Lady Navigator hat ihr Quartier verlassen und ist augenblicklich in der Offiziersmesse, wo uneingeweihte Crewmitglieder entsetzt vor ihr zurückweichen. Vielleicht solltet Ihr herausfinden, was Cassia auf das Deck geführt hat."

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan. Subay güvertesinde kargaşa çıktı. Leydi Rotacı, odasından ayrılıp subay salonuna gitmiş. Kendisi şu an orada. Durumdan habersiz tayfalar, kendisinden uzak duruyor. Ortama tedirginlik hâkim. Cassia'nın güverteye gitmesine sebep olan nedir, öğrenmek isteyebilirsiniz."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there is some commotion on the officers' deck — the Lady Navigator has left her quarters and is currently in the wardroom, where uninitiated crew members are shunning her in terror. Perhaps you should find out what has brought Cassia to the deck."
